attendance.description: Attendance is automatically recorded when the member connects to the coworking's wifi network.
attendance.title: Attendance

audit.description: All the events done by or that impacted this member.
audit.title: History

impersonation.description:
Retrieve access as the person on the mobile app.
Actions will still be audited under your name.
Impersonation will only be effective for a short period (about 30 minutes). To return to your account, clear the cache in advanced settings.
impersonation.title: Log in as

onFetch.fail: Unable to load the member's details

orders.description:
All orders placed by this member, along with their amounts.
Orders for coffee and other goodies like donations are excluded.

daily.label: On average
daily.value: {amount} consumed per day | {amount} consumed per day | {amount} consumed per day

coverage.label: Subscriptions
coverage.text: {attendance} covered by {orders} | {attendance} covered by {orders} | {attendance} covered by {orders}

onFetch.fail: Unable to fetch member's ticket orders

used.label: Consumption
used.text: {count} used over {orders} | {count} used over {orders} | {count} used over {orders}

orders.title: Orders

badge.description: Identifier of the badge assigned by Bliiida and used to access the location.
badge.label: Badge number

reset.description: Capabilities will no longer be overridden and will be computed based on the member's status.
reset.label: Reset to default values
reset.title: Reset Capabilities

KEYS_ACCESS.description: Retrieves the key box codes in the mobile app to access the coworking spaces autonomously.
KEYS_ACCESS.label: Key Box Access

MANAGER.description:
Manage members and services as well as access all features. Basically: full powers.
This setting is changed on the Wordpress profile.
MANAGER.label: Administrator

STORAGE_KEYS_ACCESS.description: Retrieves the stock key box codes in the mobile app.
STORAGE_KEYS_ACCESS.label: Stock Key Box Access

UNLOCK_DECK_DOOR.description: Using the mobile app. The door provides direct access to the Poulailler from outside.
UNLOCK_DECK_DOOR.label: Unlock Deck Door

WIFI_CREDENTIALS_ACCESS.description: Retrieves the WiFi network credentials in the mobile app.
WIFI_CREDENTIALS_ACCESS.label: WiFi Credentials Access

profile.description:
Contact information and other personal data of this member.
This information is not public.

macAddresses.add: Specify a device | Add another device | Add other devices

description.text: Check attendance through the presence of a {link} on the WiFi network.

macAddresses.label: Device | Device | {count} devices

profile.title: Profile

trusted.description:
Has acquired at least 10 days of presence.
Can access the place autonomously,
either by opening the deck door or by opening the key box.
trusted.label: Trusted

voting.description:
Has acquired at least 20 days of presence over the last 6 months.
Can vote during general assemblies.
voting.label: Voting

wordpress.description:
Retrieves and processes member data from the WordPress server.
The first name, last name, and date of birth will be overwritten.
Ticket, subscription and membership orders will be updated.
wordpress.title: Sync with WordPress

onFetchVotingMembers.fail: Unable to fetch voting members list
